content: ज्येष्ठ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (<ab>Superl.</ab> of प्रशस्य or वृद्ध). {@--1@} Eldest, most senior. {@--2@} Most excellent, best. {@--3@} Pre-eminent, first, chief, highest. --ष्ठः {@--1@} An elder brother; <ls>R. 12. 19</ls>, <ls n="R. 12.">35.</ls> {@--2@} An epithet of the Supreme Being. {@--3@} Life. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of a lunar month (= ज्यैष्ठ <ab>q. v.</ab>). --ष्ठा {@--1@} An eldest sister. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the eighteenth lunar mansion (consisting of the three stars). {@--3@} The middle finger. {@--4@} A small houselizard. {@--5@} An epithet of the Ganges. {@--6@} The goddess of misfortune, elder sister of Lakṣmī. --ष्ठी A small house-lizard. --ष्ठं {@--1@} The most excellent, the first or head. {@--2@} Tin.
